title: Yoga Classes
text: Yoga classes are available virtually, private sessions or by invitation to your group event.

title: Welcome to Yoga
text:
Welcome! Yoga is for everyone, no matter what your physical conditions are. You dont need to be flexible or strong. But with a steady practice, you can become more flexible and stronger, as well as acheive a wide variety of other health benefits (cardiovascular, hormonal balance, stability, and good posture), as well as emotional balance. Yoga will make you stronger inside and out.
For beginners there is a pose for everyone. and all poses can be modified. For more advanced students (and we are all students) you will benefit as you perfect the poses you have been practicing,
Yoga is much more than just the poses, as poses are only 1 in 8 aspects of yoga that support spiritual growth.

title: About
text:
KP has been practicing various forms of yoga, meditations, pranayam for decades from multiple teachers both in the US and India. She is a certified Yoga Aliance yoga teacher.
She shares her practice through hosting events, live discussion sessions, and yoga classes.
contact: kpmaiji@gmail.com

title: Shoulder Stands
text:
Shoulder stands were never my favorite. I always felt like i was just flailing my legs ups and crunching into my neck. It was also boring to me. But I decided to learn them all over again,
Shoulder stands offer a wide variety of health benefits, by directing pranba and blood flow up your body, .It also helps balance out hormones, particularly improve thyroid function, And if held long enough i found that it strengthens key muscle groups particularly the core and legs. After practicing shoulder stands for 5 minutes every morning, I was able to maintain better posture throughout the day. As with all poses, its best to practice with focus on the breath and channel the direction of prana to the relevant body parts. In shoulder stands, its keeping they eyes closed, breathing slowly and completely, with exhales longer than inhales, and imagining the prana moving upwards.

title: Be Spiritual Be Vegan
text:
Raising in awareness and knowing that we share conciouseness with all living creatures, we can thrive on a diet that is healthy for our bodies and healthy for the planet,
The human digestive system is designed to digest fruits and vegetables. A balanced plant based diet provides thebody with all nutrients it needs with minmal metabolic waste, and promotes energy vitality and a clear mind.
In life, we minimize harm to all life, even plants! Not taking more than want is needed to sustain life.
